euro.2020: Please note: You are entering this tournament in GW2, but you will receive compensation points for missing GW1. The compensation points equal to 100% of the average score for all teams in GW1. You will also be able to make unlimited free transfers before GW 2 kicks off. Players will as usual not receive fantasy points for extra time or penalty shootouts. Only events occurring in 90 minutes + injury time will be rewarded.
euro.2020_edit: Please note: Changes to your team must be done 90 minutes prior to start of the first match of the gameweek, for changes to count in that gameweek. Players will as usual not receive fantasy points for extra time or penalty shootouts. Only events occurring in 90 minutes + injury time will be rewarded.
